scripts.dev:api: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const configs = ['users', 'payments']; configs.forEach(config => { const path = 'services/api/drizzle'; if (!fs.existsSync(path) || fs.readdirSync(path).filter(f => f.includes(config)).length === 0) { console.log('Generating and pushing ' + config + ' database...'); execSync('bunx drizzle-kit generate --config ./drizzle.config.' + config + '.ts && bunx drizzle-kit push --config ./drizzle.config.' + config + '.ts', { cwd: 'services/api', stdio: 'inherit' }); } });" && bun --filter api dev
scripts.rmdb: rm -rf services/api/drizzle && cd services/api && bunx drizzle-kit generate --config ./drizzle.config.users.ts && bunx drizzle-kit push --config ./drizzle.config.users.ts && bunx drizzle-kit generate --config ./drizzle.config.payments.ts && bunx drizzle-kit push --config ./drizzle.config.payments.ts
